ast.name: Tower of Hanoi
ast.comment:
Game Play:
• Move the stack of pebbles into one of the two empty locations one pebble at a time.
• You can only move the pebble on the top of the stack.
• Pebbles can only be moved on top of a larger pebble.

body.text: These will be the center of each of the three locations.
Create locations. Set its range then hide.
Randomly select one of the three locations and fill it with pebbles.

thenBody.text: Create a dummy sprite then hide it.
Check if dummy overlaps with a location.
If valid move, add pebble to new location. Else, restore previous position.
If valid move, add pebble to new location. Else, restore previous position.
If valid move, add pebble to new location. Else, restore previous position.

body.text: Fill with pebbles. Set position and color.
